content:
SAVE the DATE: 18 Jan 2021, 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm CET
HL7 Europe 10 Year Anniversary Celebration: "HL7 Standards in Europe: past, present, and future"
For more details see: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HEU/2021-01-18+HL7+Europe+10+Year+Anniversary+Celebration
Hello. I would like to attend as well. Will the login information be posted here or the Confluence page? Thanks.

Discussion paper:
"Why Europe? The importance of a joint European approach to information exchange in healthcare"
https://www.nictiz.nl/wp-content/uploads/Paper-Why-Europe-Nictiz.pdf
